en: They were able to identify him by his wrist watch.
zh: 他们能够通过他的手表来辨认他。

en: His selfish attitude put my back up.
zh: 他自私的态度让我反感。

en: His parentage was unknown to us.
zh: 我们不知道他的身世。

en: No one knows what has happened to him.
zh: 没有人知道他发生了什么事。

en: I wonder if anything happened to him.
zh: 我想知道他是否发生了什么事。

en: I am fortunate compared with him.
zh: 与他相比，我是幸运的。

en: I'm fortunate compared to him.
zh: 与他相比，我是幸运的。

en: His dress is that of a gentleman but his speech and behavior are those of a clown.
zh: 他的穿着像个绅士，但他的言谈举止却像个小丑。

en: His dress is that of gentleman, but his speech and behavior are those of a clown.
zh: 他的穿着像个绅士，但他的言谈举止却像个小丑。

en: His clinic has lost many patients since the scandal.
zh: 自从丑闻发生后，他的诊所失去了很多病人。

en: She thanked him for his kindness.
zh: 她感谢他的好意。

en: I was taken in by his gentle manner.
zh: 我被他温和的态度迷惑了。

en: I would have failed but for his kind help.
zh: 要不是他的帮助，我早就失败了。

en: You might at least have appreciated his kindness.
zh: 你至少应该感激他的好意。

en: His kind acts earned him the respect of the people.
zh: 他善良的行为赢得了人们的尊重。

en: His relatives took it for granted that they would inherit the bulk of his wealth.
zh: 他的亲戚理所当然地认为他们会继承他的大部分财产。

en: She had enough sense to understand what he really meant.
zh: 她有足够的理智去理解他真正的意思。

en: I fail to understand his true aim.
zh: 我无法理解他的真正目的。

en: His white house is the most prominent one on the street.
zh: 他那栋白色的房子是这条街上最显眼的。

en: His report proved to be false.
zh: 他的报告被证明是虚假的。

en: I had to decline his offer.
zh: 我不得不拒绝他的提议。

en: It's not wise of you to turn down his offer.
zh: 你拒绝他的提议是不明智的。

en: As for his proposal, I think it is out of the question.
zh: 至于他的提议，我认为那是不可能的。

en: His application was rejected.
zh: 他的申请被拒绝了。

en: I took him up on his offer.
zh: 我接受了他的提议。

en: His application went through.
zh: 他的申请通过了。

en: His new car looked all right.
zh: 他的新车看起来还不错。

en: His new car is a real beauty.
zh: 他的新车真漂亮。

en: His new car is a beauty.
zh: 他的新车很漂亮。

en: His new car is wonderful.
zh: 他的新车很棒。

en: My car looks shabby in comparison with his new one.
zh: 和他的新车相比，我的车看起来很破旧。

en: His business returned a good profit.
zh: 他的生意获得了不错的利润。

en: His new film is worth seeing.
zh: 他的新电影值得一看。

en: His new book did not come up to our expectations.
zh: 他的新书没有达到我们的期望。

en: What do you think of his new novel?
zh: 你觉得他的新小说怎么样？

en: His new novel will come out next month.
zh: 他的新小说下个月就要出版了。

en: His new theory is beyond my apprehension.
zh: 他的新理论超出了我的理解范围。

en: His new book is planned to appear next month.
zh: 他的新书计划下个月出版。

en: His new book met with a favorable reception.
zh: 他的新书受到了好评。

en: His new book will appear next month.
zh: 他的新书下个月就要出版了。

en: His new book added to his reputation.
zh: 他的新书提高了他的声誉。

en: His new book is going to come out next month.
zh: 他的新书下个月就要出版了。
